ca.ualberta.cs.team1travelexpenseapp.claims

Class SubmittedClaim

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.team1travelexpenseapp.claims.Claim
      • ca.ualberta.cs.team1travelexpenseapp.claims.SubmittedClaim
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClaimInfo, Comparable<Claim>

    public class SubmittedClaim
extends Claim
    A claim with the status of submitted. See claim for method descriptions

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Claim claim)
        Description copied from class: Claim
        override comapreTo method so that claims will be sorted by largest to smallest date for a Claimant user and oldest to newest for an Approver user. Note only two types of users exists. use Collections.sort(ArrayList Object); to sort Object.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface ClaimInfo
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface Comparable<Claim>
        Overrides:
        compareTo in class Claim
